short_summary: Supplier requirement for Industrial Shredder with capability of shredding textiles, plastics, small metalscrap and other materials.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one Industrial Shredder. Industrial shredder must be capable of shredding textiles, plastics, small electrical or metal scrap and other miscellaneous products.
full_summary:
# Industrial Clothing Shredder Tender

* **Title**: W02D1-23G405: Industrial Clothing Shredder
* **Reference**: WS3742202259
* **Publication Date**: November 10, 2022
* **Closing Date**: December 8, 2022, 14:00 EST

## Brief Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply and delivery of one (1) industrial shredder capable of processing various materials including textiles, plastics, small electrical components, and metal scrap.

## Key Details

* **Process Standard**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Contract Period**: Following the tender call closing date
* **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None

## Delivery Details

* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Delivery Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Katie Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

To view the full tender description and download documents, visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14595065?extsite=MTQ1OTUwNjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14595065?extsite=MTQ1OTUwNjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
